mapper.select: SELECT SCV.CMP_VISIBLE_ID AS componentVisibilityId, SCV.CAT_TYPE_ID AS categoryId, SCV.COMPONENT_ID AS componentId, TRIM(VCS.COMPONENT_GROUP) AS group, TRIM(VCS.SUB_GROUP) AS subGroup, TRIM(VCS.SUB_COMPONENT_NAME) AS componentName, SCV.V2B_VISIBILITY AS screen2b, SCV.LOADSHEET_VISIBILITY AS lsOverride, (SELECT COUNT(SCRO.RULE_ID) FROM SMC_COMPONENT_RULE_OVERRIDES SCRO WHERE SCRO.CMP_VISIBLE_ID = SCV.CMP_VISIBLE_ID) AS ruleCount FROM SMC_COMPONENT_VISIBILITY SCV JOIN CORP.VEHCMPSGF VCS on SCV.COMPONENT_ID=VCS.COMPONENT_ID JOIN SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER SCM ON SCV.CAT_TYPE_ID=SCM.CAT_TYPE_ID WHERE SCM.PO_CATEGORY=#{category} AND SCM.TYPE=#{type} AND SCV.LOADSHEET_VISIBILITY !=''

SELECT CAT_TYPE_ID AS catTypeId, PO_CATEGORY AS category, TYPE AS type, USES_DEFAULT AS usesDefault, FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME AS editedBy, CTM.MODIFIED_DATE AS editedDate FROM SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER CTM LEFT JOIN SMC_USER_MASTER SUM ON SUM.SSO=CTM.MODIFIED_BY
SELECT USES_DEFAULT FROM SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER SCM WHERE SCM.PO_CATEGORY=#{category} AND SCM.TYPE=#{type}

SELECT CVRM.RULE_ID AS ruleId, NAME AS ruleName, DESCRIPTION AS description, COUNT(CRO.RULE_ID) AS timesUsed, SUMC.FIRST_NAME||' '||SUMC.LAST_NAME AS createdBy, CVRM.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, SUME.FIRST_NAME||' '||SUME.LAST_NAME AS editBy, CVRM.MODIFIED_DATE AS editDate FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_MASTER CVRM LEFT JOIN SMC_USER_MASTER SUMC ON SUMC.SSO=CVRM.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN SMC_USER_MASTER SUME ON SUME.SSO=CVRM.MODIFIED_BY LEFT JOIN SMC_COMPONENT_RULE_OVERRIDES CRO ON CVRM.RULE_ID = CRO.RULE_ID GROUP BY CVRM.RULE_ID,NAME,DESCRIPTION,SUMC.FIRST_NAME||' '||SUMC.LAST_NAME,CVRM.CREATED_DATE,SUME.FIRST_NAME||' '||SUME.LAST_NAME,CVRM.MODIFIED_DATE

SELECT TRIM(NAME) FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_MASTER
WHERE RULE_ID NOT IN ( #{ruleId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_MASTER (NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY) VALUES (#{rule.ruleName}, #{rule.description}, #{user.userSSO}, #{user.userSSO})

(#{ruleDef.ruleId}, #{ruleDef.criteriaGroup}, #{ruleDef.componentId}, #{ruleDef.componentType}, #{ruleDef.operand},#{ruleDef.value}, #{user.userSSO}, #{user.userSSO})
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_DEFINITION WHERE RULE_DEF_ID IN
#{ruleDefId}
mapper.select: SELECT TRIM(RULE_ID) AS RULE_ID, TRIM(NAME) AS NAME, DESCRIPTION FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_MASTER WHERE RULE_ID=#{ruleId}
SELECT RULE_DEF_ID, CRITERIA_GROUP, COMPONENT_TYPE, COMPONENT_ID, OPERAND, COMPONENT_VALUE FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_DEFINITION WHERE RULE_ID=#{ruleId}

SELECT SEQ_MASTER_ID AS id, NAME AS name, DESCRIPTION AS description, PO_CATEGORY AS category, TYPE AS type, LSM.OEM AS oem, FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME AS editedBy, LSM.MODIFIED_DATE AS editedDate FROM SMC_LOADSHEET_SEQ_MASTER LSM JOIN SMC_USER_MASTER SUM ON LSM.MODIFIED_BY=SUM.SSO
SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(PO_CATEGORY) AS PO_CATEGORY FROM SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER ORDER BY PO_CATEGORY

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(TYPE) AS TYPE FROM SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER
TYPE != 'DEFAULT'
AND PO_CATEGORY = #{category}
ORDER BY TYPE
SELECT DISTINCT (MFNAME ||' - ('|| MFCODE ||')') as MFR FROM CORP.FVEHMFR WHERE MFTYP${poCategoryType.mfrFieldCode} = #{poCategoryType.mfrFieldCode} ORDER BY MFR
SELECT DISTINCT RULE_ID AS ruleId, NAME AS ruleName, LOWER(NAME) as Name FROM SMC_CMP_VISIBILITY_RULES_MASTER ORDER BY Name
SELECT RULE_ID AS ruleId, PRIORITY AS priority, VISIBILITY_OVERRIDE AS lsOverride FROM SMC_COMPONENT_RULE_OVERRIDES WHERE CMP_VISIBLE_ID=#{componentVisibleId} ORDER BY PRIORITY
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SMC_COMPONENT_RULE_OVERRIDES (CMP_VISIBLE_ID,RULE_ID, PRIORITY,VISIBILITY_OVERRIDE,CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES
(#{componentVisibilityId},#{item.ruleId},#{item.priority},#{item.lsOverride},#{createdBy},current timestamp,#{createdBy},current timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT COMPONENT_ID AS componentId, COMPONENT_TYPE AS componentType, TRIM(COMPONENt_GROUP) AS componentGroup, TRIM(SUB_GROUP) AS subGroup, TRIM(SUB_COMPONENT_NAME) AS componentName FROM CORP.VEHCMPSGF ORDER BY COMPONENt_GROUP,SUB_GROUP,SUB_COMPONENT_NAME

SELECT CTM.CAT_TYPE_ID AS catTypeId, CTM.PO_CATEGORY AS category, CTM.TYPE AS type, CTM.USES_DEFAULT AS usesDefault, VCS.COMPONENT_GROUP AS componentGroup, VCS.SUB_GROUP AS subGroup, VCS.SUB_COMPONENT_NAME AS component, VCS.COMPONENT_ID AS componentId, CRO.VISIBILITY_OVERRIDE AS lsOverride FROM SMC_COMPONENT_VISIBILITY SCV JOIN SMC_COMPONENT_RULE_OVERRIDES CRO ON CRO.CMP_VISIBLE_ID = SCV.CMP_VISIBLE_ID JOIN CORP.VEHCMPSGF VCS ON SCV.COMPONENT_ID=VCS.COMPONENT_ID JOIN SMC.SMC_CAT_TYPE_MASTER CTM ON CTM.CAT_TYPE_ID = SCV.CAT_TYPE_ID
WHERE RULE_ID=#{ruleId}
